WorkItem.Description:
Unfortunately, the way a window renders in XP is shocking:
 
Custom Chrome (what I use): Windows classic style, only it looks like someone took a PHOTO of a windows classic window, and then tried to fix it
Luna: Looks REMOTELY like the Luna style, buttons are very wrong, so is the window background etc.
 
As I see it, there are two solutions to this issue:
 
* Always render in a universal style (like Aero, Aero minus transparency, an Office 2007 style(s) etc)
* Work with the given chrome rather than faking it badly
 
Really, I would not dream of using this control until this issue is out of the road.

Comments.Message: What are you talking about? I have never heard of a Custom Chrome. Is it a Windows theme you are using? If so, and it's not one of the standard themes, there's no way WPF (or developers targeting WPF) can support it.

Thanks for the feedback. We do realize that the visuals are not release quality and are still investigating some design decisions to avoid having to recreate multiple theme chromes beyond the custom Office chromes.
